model.name: Parisian Collage Jacquard Hoodie
model.disambiguatingDescription: This comfortable buy now wear now hoodie elevates a casual ensemble with its bold graphics. The sophisticated monochrome jacquard showcases the SS23 Show’s Parisian Collage motif, which incorporates multiple House icons in its homage to the French capital. Cords finished with LV stoppers and a silk label on the back complete this piece.

additionalProperty.name: detailedDescription
additionalProperty.value:
• 100% GOTS-Certified Organic Cotton
  • Dark Anthracite
  • Regular Fit
  • Model wears a FR M size
  • Model measurements : chest 32’’ / 82 cm, height 6’’ / 183 cm
  • Made in Italy

panelInformations.title: product care
panelInformations.description:
• Gentle dry clean
  • Dry clean inside out in a net
  • Iron inside out protecting garment with a fabric in between
panelInformations.introduction: To preserve the quality of this garment, we recommend you to respect the care instructions :
